title: Security forces, bandits in bloody encounter in Kwara, Kogi
description: Nigerian security forces are currently engaging armed bandits and terrorists in Okunran, Okoloke, and surrounding areas.

title: Bandits attack Ibeto community in Niger State
description: Bandits are currently in Ibeto community, Magama LGA of Niger State, shooting sporadically amid ongoing attacks in North Central region.

title: Kwara community grieves bandit attacks
description: Residents of a Kwara community are mourning recent bandit attacks and calling for government to enhance security operations.

title: Troops arrest terrorist collaborators in Kankara, Katsina
description: Nigerian troops have arrested terrorist collaborators in Kankara, Katsina State, as part of ongoing efforts against banditry.

title: NAF sustains pressure, strikes hostile elements in Kwara
description: Nigerian Air Force conducts strikes against hostile elements in Kwara State to counter bandit activities.
